name: CountryCapital
0:
”Alexa, open Country Capital”
”Alexa, ask Country Capital What is the capital of Brazil?”
”Alexa, ask Country Capital to tell me the capital of United States?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: country capital
des: You may ask what is the capital of a specific country.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
